short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Dark theme for any website. Dark Mode Master is an extension that helps you quickly turn the screen to dark at any time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Dark mode extensions for Google are browser add-ons that allow you to switch the color scheme of Google's websites from the standard white or light gray to a darker, more muted color palette. These extensions work by applying a custom CSS stylesheet to the page, which overrides the default colors and styles.
